title: ‘I Raced my First Tour of Flanders on 21mm Tires:’ Greg Van Avermaet on Cycling’s Wild Tech Evolution
content:
Van Avermaet is exploring gravel, but he's keeping a close eye on road racing's wider tires and shorter cranks: 'Everyone today is on 165mm.'

Read the full article at ‘I Raced my First Tour of Flanders on 21mm Tires:’ Greg Van Avermaet on Cycling’s Wild Tech Evolution on Velo.
